vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παραθᾰλάσσ-ιος,
Attic dialect παραθαλάττιος, α, ον (also ος, ον [Refs 5th c.BC+], beside the sea, τὰς πόλιας τὰς π. [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἡ π. (i.e. γῆ) [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: by the lake, by the seaseaside
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
by the lake, by the seaseaside
by the sea-side, situated on the sea-coast, maritime, Mt. 4:13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: junto al mar o cerca del lago
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 靠海岸的, 沿著海的 (太 4:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 靠海岸的, 沿着海的 (太 4:13)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: gần mé biển; bên bờ biển. παρά (G3844) + θάλασσα (G2281)
